> [{quoted}](name=Vonderhamz,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dxsXEyEE,comment-id=000000000002000000020000,timestamp=2016-06-27T22:29:39.992+0000)
>
> He does vigorously rip of hiss jacket in the recall. Best BM in the whole game.

I think you guys could get plenty of players to pay 1820 for the Taric skin if you could toggle his shirt on and off, as opposed to him just ripping it off on recall {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Unfortunately 1820 skins are reserved for skins that have new voice acting. 

That said, beach bum Taric would be amazing and I would definitely pay 1820 to hear Yuri Lowenthal's Fabio impression.

Don't forget he also magically dons sunglasses as he rips off the jacket.

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect

Nope. Best BM in the whole game is Pool Party MF's recall by far. Playing on the PBE and I couldn't get over how fun it was to spam recall and start taking selfies to celebrate every victory. Kill an enemy champion? Selfie. Any objective whatsoever? Selfie. Narrow escape? Selfie. Kill one minion? Selfie. Etc.

Pool Party MF is the definition of Instagram toxic.

Naw, Taric joke. Same deal, more awesome.

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect
Better than the udyr fap?

So I was watching the Pool Party Taric Skin Spotlight...
When I head the joke, I paused the video and checked if something was wrong with my headset

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/847/015/01a.jpg

I facepalmed loudly.

You guys did an amazing job though! Fucking love it c:
I know what to play this summer.

I am torn between dissapointment, curiousity, excitement, and regret (for becoming a toplane main)

Poor,crab

Honestly though, I'm a little disappointed with this year's pool party skins. Taric looks great and he needed a new skin, but MF and Fiora? They already have tons of skins. They are good skins, don't get me wrong, but it just seems like there are better candidates for new skins than champs that already have several. Not to mention the fact that there are only three this year.
